ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case', ISPICKVAL(Type,'DialSource Request'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Title,'Manager')), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Title,'Assistant')), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Title,'Supervisor')), ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'New User Setup'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'Existing User Transfer'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'LOA User Returning to Work'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'Add/Remove Agents from Queue'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'Add/Remove Agents from Agent Group')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to the Request Type/Sub-Type selected. Please work with your Manager or Sales Assistant to submit it.
